category.itemio.name: Item IO
yacl.itemio.title: ItemIO
yacl.itemio.toggle_bind.label: Toggle Bind
yacl.itemio.toggle_bind.desc:
Whether to toggle the bind.

§lTip for Toggle Mode: §7You can cancel a selection with the `Escape` key
yacl.itemio.look_container.label: Need to Look at Container
yacl.itemio.look_container.desc: Whether you need to look at a container in order to be able to do operations.
yacl.itemio.animate_item.label: Animate Item
yacl.itemio.animate_item.desc: Whether to animate item and text.
yacl.itemio.animate_opacity.label: Animate Opacity
yacl.itemio.animate_opacity.desc: Whether to animate the opacity of the selection.
yacl.itemio.group.outline_color.label: Outline Color
yacl.itemio.group.outline_color.desc: The color to overlay over blocks when storing or extracting from an container.
yacl.itemio.color.r.label: Red
yacl.itemio.color.r.desc: The red part of the color.
yacl.itemio.color.g.label: Green
yacl.itemio.color.g.desc: The green part of the color.
yacl.itemio.color.b.label: Blue
yacl.itemio.color.b.desc: The blue part of the color.
yacl.itemio.color.a.label: Alpha
yacl.itemio.color.a.desc:
How transparent the color should be.

§lAny value under 10 for some reason Minecraft doesn't render.
